acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using Alphalens.ai ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Service. Continued use of the Service after any modification constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.description: Alphalens.ai provides AI-powered financial research, trading insights, and portfolio analysis tools. Our Service includes:
service.feature1: AI-generated trade setups and market analysis
service.feature3: Portfolio management and risk assessment tools
service.feature4: Real-time market data and technical indicators

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.item1: Provide accurate and complete registration information
responsibilities.item2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
responsibilities.item3: Use the Service in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
responsibilities.item4: Not attempt to reverse engineer, exploit, or disrupt the Service
responsibilities.item5: Not share your account with unauthorized parties

disclaimer.title: 4. Investment Disclaimer
disclaimer.warning: IMPORTANT: Trading and investing involve substantial risk of loss.
disclaimer.description: Alphalens.ai provides informational content and analytical tools only. We do not provide investment advice, and our AI-generated insights should not be construed as personalized financial recommendations. You are solely responsible for your trading decisions and their outcomes.
disclaimer.advice: Past performance does not guarantee future results. Always conduct your own research and consult with qualified financial advisors before making investment decisions.

ai.title: 5. AI Transparency & EU AI Act Compliance
ai.description: In accordance with the EU Artificial Intelligence Act (Regulation 2024/1689), we disclose the following about our use of AI systems:
ai.item1: All trade setups, market analyses, and insights are generated by artificial intelligence models and do not constitute personalized financial advice
ai.item2: Our AI systems are classified as limited-risk under the EU AI Act; users are clearly informed when interacting with AI-generated content
ai.item3: AI outputs may contain inaccuracies or errors — users must exercise independent judgment before acting on any AI-generated recommendation
ai.item4: You have the right to request human review of any automated decision that significantly affects you, in compliance with Article 22 of the GDPR

subscription.title: 6. Subscription and Billing
subscription.item1: Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually in advance
subscription.item2: Free trial periods do not require payment information
subscription.item3: You may cancel your subscription at any time; cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period
subscription.item4: Refunds are provided at our discretion on a case-by-case basis
subscription.item5: Credit allocations reset based on your plan's renewal cycle

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: All content, features, and functionality of Alphalens.ai — including but not limited to algorithms, models, interfaces, and documentation — are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Alphalens.ai and its affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, trading losses, or business interruption, arising from your use of or inability to use the Service.

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your data for the following periods, in accordance with GDPR Article 5(1)(e) and applicable financial regulations:
dataRetention.item1: Account data: retained for the duration of your active account plus 3 years after deletion
dataRetention.item2: Trading history and AI interactions: retained for 5 years for regulatory compliance
dataRetention.item3: Payment records: retained for 7 years as required by tax and financial regulations
dataRetention.item4: Server logs and analytics: retained for 12 months, then anonymized

age.title: 10. Age Restriction
age.description: The Service is intended for users aged 18 years or older. By using Alphalens.ai, you confirm that you are at least 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from individuals under 18. If we become aware that a user is under 18, we will promptly terminate their account and delete associated data.

availability.title: 11. Service Availability
availability.description: We strive to maintain high availability, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access to the Service. We may modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the Service at any time with reasonable notice. Scheduled maintenance windows will be communicated in advance when possible.

governing.title: 12. Governing Law & Jurisdiction
governing.description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the European Union and, where applicable, the laws of Spain. Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms shall be submitted to the competent courts of Madrid, Spain, without prejudice to your rights under mandatory consumer protection laws of your country of residence.

changes.title: 13. Modifications to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated at least 30 days in advance via email or prominent notice on the Service. Your continued use of the Service after the effective date of any modification constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms. If you disagree with any changes, you may terminate your account before the changes take effect.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
collection.item1: Account information (name, email address, company details)
collection.item3: Usage data and interaction with our AI features
collection.item4: Payment information (processed securely through Stripe — we never store card details)

legalBasis.title: 2. Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR Art. 6)
legalBasis.description: We process your personal data on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.item1: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a)): for marketing communications and optional analytics cookies
legalBasis.item2: Contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b)): to provide the Service, manage your account, and process payments
legalBasis.item3: Legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c)): to comply with tax, financial reporting, and anti-money-laundering regulations
legalBasis.item4: Legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f)): to improve our Service, ensure security, and prevent fraud

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect to:
usage.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
usage.item3: Process your transactions and manage subscriptions
usage.item4: Send you technical notices and support messages
usage.item5: Communicate about products, features, and updates (with your consent)

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.description: We implement robust security measures to protect your data, in compliance with GDPR Article 32 and DORA requirements:
security.item1: End-to-end encryption for sensitive financial data (TLS 1.3 in transit, AES-256 at rest)
security.item2: Regular security audits and penetration testing
security.item3: Secure cloud infrastructure with Supabase (EU-hosted where applicable)
security.item4: Strict access controls, multi-factor authentication, and role-based permissions

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data only:
sharing.item2: With vetted service providers who assist our operations (under Data Processing Agreements)
sharing.item3: To comply with legal obligations, court orders, or regulatory requests
sharing.item4: With your broker if you have linked your brokerage account

transfers.title: 6. International Data Transfers
transfers.description: Your data may be transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA). When this occurs, we ensure adequate protection through:
transfers.item1: EU Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission
transfers.item2: Adequacy decisions recognized by the European Commission for the destination country
transfers.item3: Binding Corporate Rules or other approved transfer mechanisms under GDPR Chapter V

retention.title: 7. Data Retention Periods
retention.description: We retain your data only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy:
retention.item1: Account data: duration of your account plus 3 years after deletion
retention.item3: Payment records: 7 years (tax and financial regulations)
retention.item4: Server logs: 12 months, then anonymized or deleted

profiling.title: 8. Profiling & Automated Decision-Making
profiling.description: Our Service uses AI algorithms to generate trade setups and market analysis. These outputs are informational only and do not produce legal or similarly significant effects on you. You have the right to request human intervention, express your point of view, and contest any automated decision under GDPR Article 22. To exercise this right, contact our DPO.

aiTransparency.title: 9. AI Transparency (EU AI Act)
aiTransparency.description: In compliance with the EU Artificial Intelligence Act (Regulation 2024/1689):
aiTransparency.item1: All AI-generated content is clearly labeled as such within the Service
aiTransparency.item2: We do not use your personal data to train AI models without explicit consent
aiTransparency.item3: You may request a detailed explanation of how AI outputs were generated for your specific queries

rights.title: 10. Your Rights (GDPR Articles 15–22)
rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.item1: Right of access: obtain a copy of your personal data (Art. 15)
rights.item2: Right to rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data (Art. 16)
rights.item3: Right to erasure: request deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten') (Art. 17)
rights.item4: Right to restriction: limit how we process your data (Art. 18)
rights.item5: Right to data portability: receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format (Art. 20)
rights.item6: Right to object: object to processing based on legitimate interest or for direct marketing (Art. 21)

cookies.title: 11. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze usage patterns, and maintain session security. Essential cookies are required for the Service to function. Analytics and marketing cookies are only activated with your explicit consent. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through the cookie settings or your browser configuration.

dpo.title: 12. Data Protection Officer (DPO)
dpo.description: Our Data Protection Officer oversees compliance with GDPR and applicable data protection laws. For any data protection inquiries, rights requests, or complaints, contact our DPO at:

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have general questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
